item.description:
Since some folks said the third Thursday of the month would be better, here it is!
Bring any learning materials you'd like to share. We can pair up to do practice drills, or just chat. Please come, feel free to bring a friend!
(This month the 3rd Th 2/17 falls into the same week as the regular Meetup, 2/15)

On-street parking available across the park on Washington St.
By T, walk into the South End from Back Bay Orange Station on Clarendon St, jog right or left a block to cross Tremont St, next is Shawmut Ave- Qing Ping's at the corner of Dwight St.

Or, from the Silver Line Bus, get off at Washington and E. Berkeley St, walk across the park to Shawmut Ave.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Third Thursday Chinese Conversation Meetup
